ExampleDefinition.Title: Using PointMarkers
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates the new PointMarker API in SciChart 2.0. Now built-in types handle Ellipse, Square, Cross, Triangle markers and a special type allows for UIElements to be rendered to bitmap at data-point values (SpriteMarker).
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Using Pointmarkers</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Demonstrates the new PointMarker API in SciChart 2.0. Now built-in types handle Ellipse, Square, Cross, Triangle markers and a special type allows for UIElements to be rendered to bitmap at data-point values (SpriteMarker).</Run>
